```{r}
library(fs)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
dir_info(regexp = '\\.md$') %>% 
    filter(
        !path %>% str_detect("^a"),
        !path %>% str_detect("^(README|CODE_|NEWS)")
    ) %>% 
    mutate(
        mv = map(path,file_move, new_path = 'analysis')
    )
```
